entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries mixed with rain showers early this evening and ending this evening then partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023
